title: I am in the 7th standard and I want to be an IAS officer. How should I prepare for that? - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: You are a little too young to be preparing for an exam like UPSC. Please enjoy your childhood and school days to the fullest. However, here are a few things YOU CAN TAKE ARE OF— Focus on your social sciences subjects for now. Read them with interest.Get a habit of being aware of what has been happening around you, like current events.DO NOT START READING ANY KIND OF MATERIAL, YOU WILL HAVE ENOUGH TIME AFTER YOUR 12TH OR GRADUAION.hope this helps

Pay full attention to your school studies. Participate in debates and other extracurricular activities. 2. Read one or two newspapers daily, focusing on their editorials and edit page articles. Read a few news magazines too.
